General.Name: Shanghai Runda Med Tech Co
General.Description: Shanghai Runda Medical Technology Co., Ltd. provides integrated medical laboratory services in China. It offers platform supply, laboratory design/renovation, laboratory standardization, and information management system services; medical solutions to help healthcare professionals in the areas of biochemistry, diabetes, POCT, immunoassay analyzer, and molecular biology diagnosis; professional technical services; and logistic services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shanghai, China.
